Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2010 04:09AM nancyverruto wrote: My son had his jaw broken and wired shut....6 weeks of very thin liquids......He always added an egg to anything in the blender......Ensure, packet of Carnation Instant Breakfast, heavy cream and ice cream or chocolate syrup....with an egg......would blend Progresso veggie soup and put a dollop of sour cream on it.....was sick of milk shakes and soup by the end....good luck...
